title: Effect of RIR increase in U.S. on capital flows

content.question: If the real interest rate in the United States increases relative to that of the rest of the world, capital should flow

choices.label: into the United States and the dollar will depreciate
into the United States and the dollar will appreciate
out of the United States and the dollar will depreciate
out of the United States and the dollar will appreciate
out of the United States and the value of the dollar will not change

content.answer: into the United States and the dollar will appreciate

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
